title: Carvex
description: A comprehensive full-stack solution developed with React and Node.js, designed to streamline task management and enhance team collaboration effectively.
challenges: Problem with database integration due to schema mismatch.
UI responsiveness issues on mobile due to complex CSS layout.
improvements: Improve performance with better state management using Redux.
Enhance UI design for mobile-first approach, including media queries and flexible layouts.

title: Phingee
description: This is a WordPress-based website developed with custom themes and plugins, focusing on user experience and easy content management.
challenges: Optimizing WordPress performance for high traffic sites.
Compatibility issues between different plugins and WordPress updates.
improvements: Improve site speed with better caching and lazy loading techniques.
Enhance security features by integrating additional security plugins.

title: Gamer Crit
description: A full-stack application built with React and Node.js to help users manage tasks and collaborate with others efficiently.
challenges: Dealing with asynchronous requests and ensuring seamless user interaction.
Managing user authentication and authorization securely.
improvements: Refactor the codebase to improve maintainability and readability.
